overview:
David Koretz is a serial entrepreneur who founded four companies by the age of 19. He is currently President & CEO of BlueTie, and President of Mykonos Software.

Under the leadership of Mr. Koretz, BlueTie has been a three-time recipient of Forbes Magazine â€œBest of the Webâ€ as one of the top four Websites in the world for small businesses, winner of the 2008 AlwaysOn Top 100 award, PC Magazine Four Star Award, and the Ad-Tech award for Best B2B Transaction Website.

Mr. Koretz was the recipient of Teen People Magazine’s â€œ20 Teens Who Will Change the World” award, the “40 Under 40 Award,” and the Digital Rochester “Rising Star Award.”

Mr. Koretz currently serves as a Board Member of Earthlink, BlueTie, RIT President’s Roundtable, Adventive, Mykonos Software, The Young Entrepreneur’s Academy, and the RIT School of Computing. He is a monthly columnist in Media Post.
